q: decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability'' at the top of the company, he added. He said as Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Mr Eric Schmidt said. producer Cecile Frot-Coutaz says Idol isn't making the mistake of trying to replace Simon Cowell with a facsimile.`` You can't, and it would be foolish to try to do that,'' she says. If you go,` We're going to find another slightly nasty British( recording) executive,' people would reject that because that person would never live up to what Simon Cowell is. That's a recipe for disaster. In our very humble opinion, the only thing you can do is try to create a panel that's entertaining, likable and credible.
